lines.text: Just because you can't see something doesn't mean it's not there.
I love the smell of polyurethane in the morning.
You've got a lot of guts. Let's see what they look like.
We can't have toys out on the market that may be dangerous.
How can they be dangerous? Everything on them is standard. The design is standard, the materials are standard... The mechanicals are standard. Even the... Oh.
What's "Oh"?
What?
You just said "Oh."
No, l said "Oh."
"Oh" like "Something interesting" or "We're screwed"?
No. l mean, hey, whoa, oh... Forget the "Oh". l'll go to legal to start on the countersuit.
The chips! That's the "Oh."! These microprocessing chips. What do they do and where did you get them from?
They microprocess. And they come from the land of l Saved Your Job.

[as Irwin checking the origins of the chips in the computer]
They were designed for the Defense Department. You put munitions chips in toys?
We're not toys, we're action figures!
The chips are a little sensitive to EMP.
EMP?
Electomagnetic Pulse. As in the kind generated by the detonation of a nuclear device? I doubt that the toy industry has become quite that competitive.
I think I over-plucked my eyebrows!
[while pulling the X-1000 chip from the deceased Nick Nitro's head]
A mind is a terrible thing to waste.

you are the best of the best of the few and the proud. So ask not what your country can do for you, only regret that you have but one life to live! The war against the Gorgonites will be won! Commando Elite, let the first shot be fired! Search out the Gorgonites and frag 'em all!
I think World War II was my favorite war.
Greetings. I am Archer, emissary or the Gorgonites.
Awfully polite for a monster.
Alan, friend of Archer, defender of all Gorgonites, Keeper of Encarta...
"Keeper of Encarta"? You were using my computer? If I find a virus in there you're headed for the microwave!
Sixteen? Where'd they get sixteen from?
Seven Gorgonites and nine people
We shouldn't fight, we should hide.
If we hide, we will still lose. No more hiding.
Watch out! She's got a baton! It's a Bataan death march!

[Freakenstein and Punch-It are at Alan's computer]
What are you looking for?
Gorgon.
Well, this is a Central Park.
The Isle of Gorgon is our homeland.
Will you help us find it?
I don't think you're gonna find it in here.

[at Alan's bedroom window]
Alan, if Gorgon is not in that window, is it in this one?
Are you scared? We're all scared. You'd have to be crazy not to be scared.
What are you worried about? They're only toys...
What's your name?
Alan. Now shut up!
Greetings, Alan now shut up.
All my makeup is cruelty free!
Nick Nitro's battery has run out, but his memory lives on.
It's a small world after all.
We are the Commando Elite. Everything else is just a toy!
If you can't accessorize, pulverize!
His battery has run out but his memory will keep going, and going, and going.
Damn the torpedoes, or give me death.
Excuse me, did you say "learn"?

[stuttering]
Learn, learn... yeah
...Next.
If it lacerates or detonates, I want it mobile and I want it lethal.
An officer and a gentleman does not strike a lady!
Damn potholes.
Let's see if her head pops off!
So what's the seminar your dad's goin' to?
"How to Make a Success of Your Small Buisness." My suggestion was torch the place.
Not a good idea. Arson forensics nowadays is very sophisticated.
Any sign of the Gorgonites?
No, none of them.

[calling off shot]
Come on Christy!

[kisses Alan on cheek]
I gotta go.
[Alan grabs her and kisses her overdramatically]

[getting into helicopter, looking at wreckage]
Too bad, would've made a hell of a commercial.
Great! All we need now is a nuclear warhead.
l doubt l'll have one in the junk drawer.
Nuclear warhead? What are you talking about?
The chips aren't shielded against an EMP. A nuclear blast would wipe them out.
That's why the military never used them.
What kind of moron would put military technology in toys?

[pointing at Larry]
Well that would be Gizmo over here.
Gorgonites, we must help Alan.
But if we fight, we would lose.
Last time we fought, I woke up with AM/FM.
I tell you, war is nuts, and I know what I'm talking about.
We shouldn't fight, we should hide.
So when am I going to get the Major Chip Hazard figure?
Never, if you don't shut up.
There will be no mercy.
Now these guys are soldiers, right? And what do soldiers need?
Hats?
I'm gonna find a way to stop these guys before my wife gets tennis elbow.
We have met the enemy, and he is you.
Yo maggot! An officer and a gentlemen does not strike a lady.
What?
You rescued me!
[Grabs Alan and gives him a passionate kiss]
Anytime
[Christy grabs Alan and gives him another passionate kiss]
Lets go get those creeps!
[first lines]
He's here! He's early! He's not supposed to be here now. He said... okay, here's the copy of... check.
Pretty exciting, huh?

I don't know. I think it's kinda sad, I mean you know Heartland Toys has a long tradition of bringing joy to kids, ya know? Gil Mars isn't going to care about any of that. He's just gonna care about profits. I think it sucks.
Welcome to Earth, Irwin. You may not be familiar with our company, but this is pretty much the way things work down here in the real world.
Yeah, well the real world sucks.
